name: Dragon Warren - Dragon Slayer
description:
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

You wake up in what appears to be an underground prison that has seen better days. Magic is thick in the air, with fire now dancing at your fingertips. 

Going down means lava, so upwards must be freedom. But first you must make your way through the undead. 

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Future Updates: 

Transition Dragon into a proper Final Boss 

Add optional mini bosses and more enemy types 

Add more spells and weapons 

Replace opening and closing texts with animations 

Fix lights turning on and off

Add lore notes throughout level 

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls

WASD - Movement

Space bar - Jumping

Shift - Sprint

E - Interact/Pick up

I - Inventory

1 - Melee weapon Hot bar slot

2 - Spell Hot bar slot

Left Mouse Button - Attack for melee/ cast spell when spell equipped

Right Mouse Button - Use of shield when equipped
